Welcome to the `teal` workshop on PHUSE CSS.

## Packages used:

[![](https://github.com/insightsengineering/hex-stickers/blob/main/PNG/teal.png?raw=true){width=150}](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal/)
[`teal`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal/) - Shiny-based interactive exploration framework for analyzing data

[`teal.modules.general`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.general/) - General Purpose Teal Modules

[`teal.modules.clinical`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/) - Provides teal modules for the standard clinical trials outputs

## Environment

This workshop will be run entirely in the Shinylive service. Please read an introductionary article [here](./shinylive.qmd). Alternatively one can use [Posit Cloud](https://posit.cloud/spaces/340990) (requires regestration) or run locally (requires installing the packages).

The code is available on [GitHub](https://github.com/pharmaverse/tealworkshop-phusecss2025).
